comments:
I'm behind an authenticating proxy. In order to get through that proxy, I need to change the proxy settings in preferences so that I get asked for the password again every time.

Either UM should store the proxy password, or it should ask every time without a change of proxy settings.

I got the hint that there are *TWO* proxy settings in my Preferences, the one I have set in Install/Update, and another in Internet (coming from ???, maybe WTP). Setting both to the same values gets me the password dialog every time.

So this may well qualify as a bug for Callisto.

I have the same issue with 3.2 installed and no callysto added.
When is this going to be addressed?
